hymn.title: These things says the Holy One

layout.singingstanza: These things says the Ho -- ly One, The true One, the One who has the key of Da -- vid, The One who o -- pens, no one will shut, And shuts and no one o -- pens: I know your works; Be -- hold, I have put be -- fore you an o -- pened door Which no one can shut, Be -- cause you have a lit -- tle power, Have kept My word, Have not de -- nied My name.

hymn.notes: Composed during the 2012 College Training in Occidental, CA, USA.

lyrics.stanza: These things says the Holy One, The true One, the One who has the key of David, The One who opens, no one will shut, And shuts and no one opens:
I know your works; Behold, I have put before you an opened door Which no one can shut, Because you have A little power, Have kept My word, Have not denied My name.
